 Here's what I think of Jobs's Macworld keynote 
 Never one to shy away from Friday-morning quarterbacking, Stephan deconstructs both the good and bad in Steve Jobs's Macworld Expo keynote. Read on for his take on everything from .Mac to the new iMac.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  STEVE KOVSKY
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 TiVo: Why it gets no gold stars for mandatory ads 
 First TiVo forced subscribers' machines to record sitcoms they didn't want. Now the company is planting ads on their lists of favorite programs. No wonder TiVo owners have become such a bunch of whiners, says Steve.
